text.section:
Sec. 14-28. Penalty for violations.
Whoever carelessly violates any of the provisions of this article, shall, upon conviction thereof, be deemed guilty of an offense and shall be punished by a fine of not more than two hundred dollars ($200.00) or by imprisonment in the County Jail for a term not exceeding sixty (60) days, or by both such fine and imprisonment in the discretion of the court, and the penalties herein provided shall extend to both the actual violator and to the person or persons, firm or corporation causing, directing or permitting such violation.
